tasks.name: Set up an Overtime Policy
tasks.validation_notes: Overtime policy creation is available through a 3-step wizard: 1) Policy Name & Calculation, 2) Assign Employees, 3) Review & Save. Rate calculation options include Single Rate and Custom Rate formulas.

tasks.name: Configure Fixed Hourly Rate
tasks.actual_location: Settings > Attendance > Work Timings (Extra Hours) and Overtime Policies > Rate Calculation
tasks.validation_notes: Fixed hourly rate can be configured in two places: 1) Work Timings section with Extra Hours calculation options (Total hours, After work end time, All hours worked), 2) Overtime Policy rate calculation with formula: ((Unit x Multiplier x Salary Component) / (Working Days x Days x Hours)) x Extra hours duration

tasks.name: Assign overtime to employees
tasks.expected_location: Time > Attendance > Time and Pay Adjustments
tasks.actual_location: Time > Attendance > Time and Pay Adjustments > Scheduled tab
tasks.validation_notes: Schedule Extra Hours functionality allows assigning overtime to employees. Dialog includes: Employee selector (searchable list), Date picker, Start/End time, Hours/Minutes duration fields, Location selector. Accessed via 'Schedule Extra Hours' button.

tasks.name: View scheduled overtime as employee
tasks.actual_location: Time > My attendance > Time and Pay Adjustments (with Extra Hours filter)
tasks.validation_notes: Employee views scheduled overtime through 'My attendance' page under 'Time and Pay Adjustments' tab. Impact Type filter allows selecting 'Extra Hours' to view overtime entries. Note: There is no dedicated 'Scheduled' sub-tab in employee view - filtering by type is used instead.

discrepancy.actual: Extra Hours filter option in Impact Type dropdown
discrepancy.impact: Functionality exists but navigation path differs from documentation

tasks.name: Bulk approve overtime requests
tasks.actual_location: Time > Attendance > Time and Pay Adjustments > Pending tab
tasks.validation_notes: Bulk approval is fully functional. Pending tab shows requests with individual checkboxes and header checkbox for bulk selection. When items selected, action bar appears with: 'Reject All (X)', 'Approve all for payroll (X)', 'Approve all for leaves (X)' buttons. Quick filters available for Extra Hours, Absent Day, Early Departure, Late Arrival.

navigation_paths.admin_schedule_overtime: Time > Attendance > Time and Pay Adjustments > Scheduled
navigation_paths.admin_approve_overtime: Time > Attendance > Time and Pay Adjustments > Pending
navigation_paths.employee_view_overtime: Time > My attendance > Time and Pay Adjustments (filter by Extra Hours)

bulk_selection.mechanism: Checkboxes with header checkbox for select all
bulk_selection.action_bar_appears: On selection of one or more items
